net.sf.jclal.sampling.unsupervised

Class Resample

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.sampling.AbstractSampling
      • net.sf.jclal.sampling.unsupervised.Resample
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, ISampling, ITool, JCLAL

    public class Resample
extends AbstractSampling
    Produces a random subsample of a dataset using either sampling with replacement or without replacement. The number of instances in the generated dataset may be specified. It is an adaptation of weka.filters.unsupervised.instance.Resample class of Weka.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
